description: Adventure awaits! Put on the Transit short sleeve shirt for men and you're ready to go! Spun from polyester and spandex, it features an antimicrobial finish that wicks away moisture and does not retain odors. Pair this casual and super comfortable shirt with your favourite Bermuda shorts to create a trendy, functional look during the summer season. It's the perfect piece to complete your office or weekend outfits
name: Chlorophylle Transit SS Shirt - Mens
